trans-unit.source:
This example database shows the various possibilities for using indexes in 4th Dimension.
There are several types of indexes in 4th Dimension that can be selected according to the type of data and their use.
In addition to demonstrating their effectiveness, this example explains how to choose the most appropriate type of index.
trans-unit.target:
